name: CogEntity
summary: Represents any minecraft entity including but not limiting to Cogwheel NPCs

getEntityType.summary: Returns entity's registry id (for example minecraft:creeper)

toEntity.summary: Returns this entity as entity (this method only usefull for other objects like NPCs)

logMe.summary: Logs this CogMaster object in minecraft logs

toString.summary: Same as running Cogwheel.str passing this object as argument

equals.summary: Check if provided object equals to this object
